Based on your preferences, I would recommend watching "The Secret" (1992) directed by David O. Selig. This movie is about a man who discovers he has the power to grant wishes to those around him.

Another great recommendation could be watching "Taxi Driver" (1976) directed by Martin Scorsese. This movie is based on a novel of the same name by Paul Therrien, and stars Robert De Niro as a New York City taxi driver named Travis Bickle.

Finally, if you enjoyed "The Secret," "Taxi Driver," and are interested in another great recommendation, I would recommend watching "Little Fockers" (2013) directed by Marc Forgery. This movie is based on the novel of the same name by Dan Henry, and stars Judd Apatow as a New York City real estate broker named Gary Lobbs.

In conclusion, if you enjoyed "The Secret," "Taxi Driver," and are interested in another great recommendation, I would recommend watching "Little Fockers" (2013) directed by Marc Forgery.
